General.Name: Koh Young Technology Inc
General.Description: Koh Young Technology Inc. develops, manufactures, sells, and services 3D measurement-based inspection equipment and solutions worldwide. Its products include solder paste, automated optical, semiconductor, multi-purpose optical, and dispensing process inspection equipment, as well as smart factory solution, such as KSMART solution, KPO printers, and KPO mounters. The company offers its products for quality control and process optimization in the production fields of various industries, including smart devices, automotive electronics, telecommunications, military, health care industry, and semiconductors. Koh Young Technology Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Halla Sigma Valley, Seoul, South Korea, 08588
